title: Combining the Power of MarkLogic and Hadoop
abstract: Hadoop is a popular open-source framework for massively-distributed storage and processing. It has industry momentum behind it and notable public successes for large-scale analytics. Come learn from Hortonworks, leaders of the core open-source Hadoop projects, what Hadoop is (and isn’t) and how it can complement real-time Big Data applications in MarkLogic. We’ll talk about the upcoming MarkLogic Hadoop distribution based on the Hortonworks Data Platform and detail reference architectures for some common Big Data use cases.

surveys.comments: Good and thought provoking even if it was sales pitch
